backend/main.mo: Defines an actor with authorization mixin, user profiles, product catalog of static items, and order request types but no dynamic mutation logic shown.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs for catalog display and product-fetch fallback behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing layout, pages, hooks, state, sample data, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and applying global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx as the module entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the full TanStack Router route tree, mapping paths to customer, admin, info, and chat pages under a shared layout.
Checks admin/auth state and shows loader or unauthorized message before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Product create/edit dialog with form validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/Unauthoriz: Displays access denied UI with login option and home navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the footer with brand info, quick links, support links, and conditional admin dashboard link based on admin status.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, dropdowns, and cart indicator.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and routed content outlet.
frontend/src/config/contact.ts: Centralized exported contact info constants for the site.
frontend/src/data/sampleProducts.ts: Static list of sample product objects with IDs, descriptions, and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Hooks for listing and retrieving order requests with authorization handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Product CRUD mutation hooks that call actor methods and invalidate caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Hook to check admin privileges using actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderRequest.ts: Defines a React Query mutation hook that submits an order request through an actor and invalidates order request queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches products via an actor with fallbacks to sample data and normalizes image URLs, ensuring at least 20 products are returned.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays the brand’s story, values, and philosophy using styled sections and icon-accompanied content cards.
Admin dashboard landing page linking to order management and product catalog sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin page that lists customer order requests with loading, error handling, and detailed order cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product management page supporting listing, adding, editing, and deleting products with dialogs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart with item management, quantity controls, and an order summary, handling empty-cart states.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements a chatbot interface with message history, quick replies, navigation intents, and automated bot responses.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form with validation, simulated submission, and contact info display.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero banner and brand value sections with links to shop and about pages.
frontend/src/pages/info/BlogPage.tsx: Static blog page displaying multiple jewelry-related articles with icons, summaries, and content sections.
frontend/src/pages/info/CertificationsQu: Static info page describing product quality, materials, oxidation process, and craftsmanship using several card sections.
Collections overview page listing jewelry categories and providing details about oxidized silver with links to shop and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/info/CustomerReviewsP: Displays customer testimonials with ratings and a prompt to share experiences.
frontend/src/pages/info/CustomizationPag: A page describing options for custom jewelry, engraving, and timelines, with guidance on how to submit custom design details.
frontend/src/pages/info/FaqPage.tsx: Displays categorized FAQs about products, ordering, sizing, and shipping using accordion components.
frontend/src/pages/info/OrderTrackingPag: Explains how order tracking works, the role of the Order Reference number, and how customers receive updates.
frontend/src/pages/info/PaymentMethodsPa: Outlines the inquiry-based payment process and lists available payment methods arranged after order confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/info/PricingOffersPag: Details pricing transparency, special offers, taxes, and mentions payment options for handcrafted jewelry.
frontend/src/pages/info/PrivacyPolicyPag: Renders the privacy policy page with sections describing data collection, usage, and sharing. Uses Card components to structure detailed policy text.
frontend/src/pages/info/ReturnsExchangeP: Displays the returns and exchange policy with requirements, timelines, and guidance via Card and Alert components. Includes sections for returns, exchanges, and damaged items.
frontend/src/pages/info/ShippingDelivery: Shows shipping and delivery details including timelines, locations, and packaging info. Uses Card and Alert components to outline key shipping policies.
frontend/src/pages/info/TermsConditionsP: Provides terms and conditions including website use, order process, and product information. Structured with Card components and dynamic last-updated date.
frontend/src/pages/OrderRequestPage.tsx: Order submission form that validates user info, sends order request, clears cart, and shows confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product info, images, description, and allows adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Lists products with loading state, product previews, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Implements a persisted Zustand store managing cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total price calculation functions.
frontend/src/utils/chatbot.ts: Defines chatbot message types, text normalization, intent scoring, and a catalog of intents with responses and quick replies for user queries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters from query or hash, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current scope, architectural constraints, known issues, and existing features for the Lunara Jewels site.
